meanings.definition: A secondary panel within a larger electrical panel.
meanings.sent1: The subpanel helps distribute electricity in the main panel.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to check the subpanel for any issues before inspecting the main panel.
meanings.sent3: The subpanel threw a tiny party when the main panel wasn't looking.
meanings.sent4: The subpanel is like a loyal assistant to the main panel, always ready to help.
meanings.sent5: The subpanel hummed quietly, doing its job without any fuss.

meanings.definition: A smaller panel that is part of a larger control panel.
meanings.sent1: The technician carefully examined the subpanel inside the control panel.
meanings.sent2: Don't forget to label each subpanel for easy identification.
meanings.sent3: The subpanel decided to play hide-and-seek with the control panel.
meanings.sent4: The subpanel is the control panel's right-hand companion, always there to assist.
meanings.sent5: The subpanel gleamed brightly, standing out within the control panel.

meanings.definition: A separate panel that is connected to a main panel.
meanings.sent1: The subpanel was securely linked to the main panel for added functionality.
meanings.sent2: Ensure the subpanel is properly grounded to avoid electrical issues.
meanings.sent3: The subpanel and the main panel had a secret handshake to confirm their connection.
meanings.sent4: The subpanel acts as a satellite to the main panel, extending its reach.
meanings.sent5: The subpanel buzzed with energy, complementing the main panel's power.
